description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ck7e9","text":"This is a protocol for the purification of Syp-VAMP2 complex into native nanodiscs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ikj9","text":"Using a T2A polycistronic vector containing the VAMP2 and Synaptophysin (Syp) genes with FLAG tag, express VAMP2 and Syp in Expi-HEK293 cells using ExpiFectamine transfection reagent for   hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":187,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8h6d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":172800,"guid":"F4631400097611EFA6A10A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5nrek","text":"Spin down transfected cells and rinse in ice-cold PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ardsm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8itg0","text":"Resuspend cells expressing VAMP2-Syp into lysis buffer (  ,   ,   ) supplemented with protease inhibitor tablets.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":56,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":60,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":64,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"15ij8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"50","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"Tris HCl pH 7.4","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"150","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"NaCl","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"glycerol","scientificNotation":false,"unit":14}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bkq63","text":"Remove debris and nuclei using a 4000 rpm centrifugation spin for   minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":66,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7lue2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d0kq3","text":"Ultracentrifuge the clarified lysate at 200,000xg for   hour at   to collect membranes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":54,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":64,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ek26r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1br83","text":"Resuspend membranes in 1.5% polymer solution (ChloroSMA80) and incubate at   for   hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":75,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":81,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"36go2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"blhep","text":"Post-solubilization centrifuge the sample at 200,000xg for    hour to remove insoluble material.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":59,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"atbqa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ehdgs","text":"Incubate native nanodiscs containing VAMP2-Syp complex with anti-FLAG resin   at   with rotation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":76,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":81,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8gvdr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dc5e2","text":"Remove supernatant and wash beads extensively with   ,   ,  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":51,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":55,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":59,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"26gtg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"50","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"Tris HCl pH 7.4","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"150","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"NaCl","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"glycerol","scientificNotation":false,"unit":14}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"36k4","text":"Elute nanodiscs using buffer from Step 11 containing 3XFLAG peptide at 10 ug/ml concentration.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"kdg6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
